review: I've gone through THREE of these within ONE YEAR.And it's not as if I'm constantly streaming or have it in use all of the time.  My heaviest usage comes from streaming music from the Google Play site.  I received the first one as a Christmas present a year ago.  It worked for about six months.  The second one worked about three.  And forget about trying to have Google do a warranty swap out.  You'll have better luck obtaining access to CIA files.
